head.title: Coronavirus Update - SAU43

a.title: Sugar River Valley Regional Technical Center

li.a: Sugar River Valley Regional Technical Center
Sugar River Valley Regional Technical Center

a.span: March 13 2020 - Distance Learning Needs Survey Memo to Families

p.style: margin-bottom: 1rem; font-family: Lora, serif; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); letter-spacing: normal;

span.strong: The purpose of this page is to keep the Newport School District community updated on the status of the global COVID-19 outbreak and how the district is responding to its impact on our community.

p.style: margin-bottom: 1rem; font-family: Lora, serif; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); letter-spacing: normal;
p.span: We continue to closely monitor the situation and are in contact with state and local public health officials. This site will be updated as often as possible, including information provided by the NH Department of Health and Human Services, the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) and other trusted sources.

p.style: margin-bottom: 1rem; font-family: Lora, serif; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); letter-spacing: normal;
p.span: If you have questions you can reach out via email: bminnihan@sau43.org or call 603-865-9500

br.a: mployee Rights - Paid Sick leave and Expanded Family and Medical Leave Under the Families First Coronavirus Response Act
Department of Labor - Families First Coronavirus Response Act: Employer Paid Leave Requirements

p.style: margin-bottom: 1rem; font-family: Lora, serif; font-size: 18px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); letter-spacing: normal;
p.span: How to protect yourself and others:

p.style: margin-bottom: 1rem; font-family: Lora, serif; font-size: 18px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); letter-spacing: normal;

div.p: There are steps you can take to reduce your risk of getting sick from viral respiratory infections, and help prevent transmitting infections to others, including:

ul.style: margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 1rem; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-size: 18px; vertical-align: baseline; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; font-family: Lora, serif; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

li.style: margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; background: transparent;

ul.li: Wash your hands often with soap and water for at least 20 seconds. Use an alcohol-based hand sanitizer if soap and water are not available.

li.style: margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; background: transparent;

ul.li: Cover your mouth and nose with a tissue when you cough or sneeze, then throw the tissue in the trash and wash your hands.

li.style: margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; background: transparent;

ul.li: Do not touch your eyes, nose, or mouth with unwashed hands.

li.style: margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; background: transparent;

ul.li: Stay home from work or school if you have a fever or are not feeling well.

li.style: margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; background: transparent;

ul.li: Avoid close contact with people who are sick.

li.style: margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; background: transparent;

ul.li: Clean and disinfect objects and surfaces.

li.style: margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; background: transparent;

ul.li: Get a flu shot – it is not too late to be protected from flu.

div.span: Website by SchoolMessenger Presence. © 2020 Intrado Corporation. All rights reserved.
